mapper.select: SELECT * FROM worktime_global_policy WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO worktime_global_policy ( id, start_time, end_time, days_of_week, allowed_apps_during_work, allowed_apps_outside_work, enabled, customer_id ) VALUES ( 1, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{daysOfWeek}, #{allowedAppsDuringWork}, #{allowedAppsOutsideWork}, #{enabled}, #{customerId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE worktime_global_policy SET start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, days_of_week = #{daysOfWeek}, allowed_apps_during_work = #{allowedAppsDuringWork}, allowed_apps_outside_work = #{allowedAppsOutsideWork}, enabled = #{enabled} WHERE id = 1 AND customer_id = #{customerId}
mapper.select: SELECT uo.*, devices.number as device_name FROM worktime_device_override uo LEFT JOIN devices ON devices.id = uo.device_id WHERE uo.customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY uo.priority DESC NULLS LAST, uo.id

mapper.update: UPDATE worktime_device_override SET start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, start_datetime = #{startDateTime}, end_datetime = #{endDateTime}, days_of_week = #{daysOfWeek}, allowed_apps_during_work = #{allowedAppsDuringWork}, allowed_apps_outside_work = #{allowedAppsOutsideWork}, enabled = #{enabled}, priority = #{priority}, updated_at = now() WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} AND device_id = #{deviceId}
